title: GET_PED_STEALTH_MOVEMENT
content:
0x40321B83// GetPedStealthMovement
bool GET_PED_STEALTH_MOVEMENT(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target ped.Returns: Whether or not the ped is stealthy.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_STEALTH_MOVEMENT
GetPedStealthMovement(ped)
